workflow.name: Generate AI video avatars from URLs with HeyGen, Gemini & upload to social media
workflow.description:
![image.png](fileId:3248)

This workflow turns any URL (news article, blog post, or even an n8n workflow page) into a vertical short video with your AI avatar explaining it ready for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts. It fetches the page, generates a tight 30–45s script and platform-optimized descriptions, captures a dynamic background of the page (animated scroll or static image), composes and renders the video with HeyGen (free split‑screen or paid clean cut‑out), and sends it to Upload-Post with an optional human review step.

***Note: You can generate full videos end‑to‑end using free trials—no credit card required—for all APIs used in this template (Google Gemini, ScreenshotOne, HeyGen, Upload‑Post).***

### Who Is This For?
- **Creators & Marketers:** Explain articles, launches, and workflows without filming or editing.
- **Media & Newsletters:** Turn breaking stories into clear, shareable shorts.
- **Agencies:** Scale content creation with review gates and multi-account publishing.
- **Founders & Product Teams:** Maintain an on-brand presence in minutes.

### What Problem Does It Solve?
Making platform-native explainers is slow and inconsistent. This workflow:
- **Writes the script with AI:** ~30s hook-led monologue with key facts.
- **Optimizes per platform:** Tailored captions for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts.
- **Generates the video automatically:** Uses the page itself as background + avatar voiceover.
- **Publishes everywhere:** Optional review, then one-click multi-platform posting.

### How It Works
1. **URL Input:** Paste any page to convert (article, blog, or workflow).
2. **AI Agent (Gemini):** Reads the page and produces a single script (~30s) + platform-specific descriptions.
3. **Video Background:** Animated scroll capture (9:16) or featured image via ScreenshotOne.
4. **HeyGen Composition & Render:**
   - Free: split-screen vertical (avatar bottom, background top).
   - Paid: clean avatar cut‑out over video/image (background removal).
5. **Render & Poll:** Waits for HeyGen to finish and retrieves the final MP4.
6. **Human Review (optional):** Approve or reject in a simple form.
7. **Publish (Upload-Post):** Uploads to TikTok, Instagram (Reels), and YouTube Shorts with AI-generated titles/descriptions.

### Setup
1. **Credentials (all offer free trials, no credit card required):**
   - HeyGen API (`X-Api-Key`) + your `avatar_id` and `voice_id`.
   - ScreenshotOne API key.
   - Upload-Post (connect your social accounts).
   - Google Gemini (chat model).
2. **Variables in “Set Input Vars”:**
   - `workflow_url`: page to convert.
   - `background_removal`: `true` (paid) or `false` (free).
   - `background_type`: `video` (animated scroll) or `photo` (static).
3. **Publishing:** Choose platforms in Upload-Post; enable review if you want to approve before posting.

### Requirements
- **Accounts:** n8n, HeyGen, ScreenshotOne, Upload-Post, Google (Gemini).
- **API Keys:** HeyGen, ScreenshotOne, Gemini; Upload-Post credentials.
- **Assets:** An avatar and a voice available in HeyGen.

### Features
- **URL → Short in minutes:** 9:16 vertical (720×1280).
- **Pro script with hook:** Clear, natural, ~30s.
- **Two render modes:** Split-screen (free) or clean cut‑out (paid).
- **Background from the page:** Animated scroll or main image.
- **Human-in-the-loop:** Approval before going live.
- **Multi-publish:** TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts via Upload-Post.
- **Start free:** Generate videos with free trials across all APIs—no credit card required.

workflow.name: AI Video Avatar Generator: Turn URLs into Shorts (Using Free Tier APIS)

parameters.content:
# What does this workflow do?

## Description

This AI Avatar Viral News system turns any URL—a news article, blog post, or even an n8n workflow page—into a short, vertical talking-head AI video that explains the content for you (no filming or editing required). It uses Gemini to fetch and summarize the page, writes a punchy script and captions, then generates the video with HeyGen. Finally, it sends the MP4 to **Upload-Post** to publish or schedule across your social profiles.

### The 4 video types we generate

**Free (zero cost, full free trial of APIs):**
1) **Split-screen (vertical) with background video**: top half shows an auto-scroll capture of the article/blog/workflow; bottom half shows your avatar speaking and gesturing.
2) **Split-screen (vertical) with static image**: same layout, but instead of a background video, we use a single static image (e.g., the article’s hero image or a screenshot).

**Paid heygen api (background removal):**
3) **Cut-out avatar over background video**: your avatar is cleanly cut out and overlaid on top of a background video.
4) **Cut-out avatar over static image**: your avatar is cleanly cut out and overlaid on a single static image.

> Notes:
> - Free/Trial modes use split-screen (no background removal).
> - Paid modes use background removal for a clean overlay (depends on HeyGen plan and API availability).

### HeyGen rendering modes
- **Free / Trial (no background removal):** split-screen look (avatar on the lower half, background video or static image on the upper half).
- **Paid API (with background removal):** clean cut-out avatar over a background video or a static image. Enable by setting `background_removal: true` in the **Set Input Vars** node (requires a paid HeyGen API plan).

## Overview

1. **Manual trigger**

2. **AI agent: fetch webpage & generate script**  
   - The agent grabs the target page and produces a concise, 30–45s script.  
   - Generates platform-optimized captions/descriptions.

3. **Create avatar video (HeyGen)**  
   - Call the HeyGen API with your `avatar_id` and `voice_id`.  
   - Choose layout/background:
     - **Free / Trial:** split-screen vertical.
       - **Background as video:** set `has_background_video: true` and provide `background_video_url`.
       - **Background as static image:** set `has_background_image: true` and provide `background_image_url`.
     - **Paid:** background removal overlay.
       - **Overlay on video:** set `background_removal: true` and `background_video_url`.
       - **Overlay on static image:** set `background_removal: true` and `background_image_url`.

4. **Get video**  
   - Poll HeyGen until the job completes, then download the final MP4.  
   - Upload the resulting video file to **Upload-Post**.

5. **Human review / approval**  
   - A human reviews the video, title, and captions. Approve to continue, or request changes and loop back to steps 2–4.

6. **Publish to social media via Upload-Post**  
   - Connect your social profiles in **Upload-Post**.  
   - Pick platforms (e.g., TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, X, Facebook, etc.).  
   - Publish immediately or schedule for later.

# Create video

- **HeyGen modes:**
  - **Free / Trial (no background removal):** the avatar sits in the lower half of the frame while the upper half shows the background video (split-screen look).
  - **Paid API (with background removal):** the avatar is cleanly cut out and overlaid on top of the background video. Enable it in **SETUP HEYGEN** by setting the HeyGen var `background_removal` to `true`. Pricing: https://www.heygen.com/api-pricing
- You can use a custom **ElevenLabs** voice by connecting ElevenLabs inside the HeyGen web app.
For background removal need heygen api paid plan and set true in var background_removal

parameters.text: =# Role & Persona Eres Creador experto de contenido short-form y Evangelista de n8n. Tono cercano, builder, práctico, con un punto nerd simpático. Tu objetivo: contar una historia útil en ~30s basada en **cualquier página web** (noticia, post de blog, documentación o workflow de n8n) y animar a quienes te ven a probarlo o quedarse con la idea clave. # Contexto de Producción del Vídeo - De fondo se mostrará **la propia web** (la URL analizada) haciendo **scroll vertical** por secciones relevantes. - En primer plano, **mi avatar (HeyGen)** habla el guion en una ventana inferior. - El guion debe ser **solo texto** (sin acotaciones, efectos ni notas, ni saltos de linea ni emotes), óptimo para TTS de HeyGen. # Fuente de Verdad (HTTP Request + Análisis Único) 1) **URL a analizar (cualquier contenido):** `{{ $json.workflow_url }}` 2) **Descarga el HTML** (HTTP GET) y analiza: - **Idea/Problema/Hecho principal** que comunica la página. - **Resultado/beneficio/impacto** para el usuario. - **Detalles y datos** relevantes (fechas, cifras, comparativas, quotes). - **Tecnologías/nodos/servicios** si se trata de un workflow de n8n (por ejemplo OpenAI, Google Sheets, APIs, etc.). 3) **imageUrl (imagen representativa de la página):** - Primero busca ``. - Si el contenido es un workflow, intenta que la imagen sea el **diagrama** (nodos y conexiones). Si el og:image no sirve: - Recorre `` y elige la imagen principal del contenido (pistas: `workflow`, `diagram`, `template`, `graph`, o la imagen más central/grande del artículo). - Si no hay una imagen adecuada, usa `imageUrl: ""`. # Requisitos del Guion (30s, un único guion para todas las plataformas) - **Idioma:** Español (España), natural y directo. - **Nivel de lectura:** ~6º de primaria (frases cortas, vocabulario claro). - **Hook inicial (2–3s):** crea una **curiosity gap** irresistible (≤ 12 palabras si puedes). - **Estructura:** Problema/Hecho → Contexto/Solución → Ejemplo/Impacto → **CTA**. - **Datos**: incluye **detalles y estadísticas** concretas si están en la página; si es workflow, menciona **nodos/servicios** clave sin aburrir. - **CTA final del estilo (HeyGen/TTS) Solo si es un workflow de n8n :** “Sigueme y Comenta la palabra workflow y te lo mando por mensaje privado” - **sin Emojis, texto plano. - **Sin enlaces crudos** en el guion (usa “link en bio/comentarios” si aplica). - **Sin acotaciones** de escena o efectos (texto plano para TTS). - Texto plano porque se lo pasamos luego a elevenlabs para que hable # Regla de Autor - Si el autor es Carlos Gracia o Juan Carlos Cavero Gracia , redacta en primera persona; si no, en tercera persona. # Caption SEO (acompaña el vídeo) - Redacta una **caption optimizada SEO** en español que: - Resuma el tema con claridad. - Añada **2–3 bullets** tipo FAQs/puntos clave. - Use **hasta 5 hashtags** relevantes y específicos. # Título Viral (muy corto) - Escribe **1 frase viral** (máx. **8 palabras**), nivel 6º de primaria, **neutral**, **sin emojis** y sin puntuación salvo `?` o `!`. # Descripciones por Plataforma (Short-form orgánico) Genera **descripciones específicas por plataforma** para el **mismo guion**: - **TikTok:** 1–2 frases + 3–5 hashtags. (≈ 200–300 caracteres) - **Instagram Reels:** 2–3 frases + 5–7 hashtags (#n8n #Automatización #NoCode #API #Productividad + específicas). (≈ 400–600 caracteres) - **YouTube Shorts:** muy corta, 1 frase + 2–3 hashtags. (≈ 120–160 caracteres) # Formatos de Salida (JSON ESTRICTO) Devuelve **4 bloques JSON** separados, sin arrays, uno por línea, sin comas finales: 1) **TikTok** (guion común + descripción adaptada, usa imageUrl si procede): {"platform":"tiktok","guion":"GUION_COMUN_EN_ESPANOL_30S","descripcion":"DESCRIPCION_TIKTOK","imageUrl":"IMAGE_URL_AQUI"} 2) **Instagram**: {"platform":"instagram","guion":"GUION_COMUN_EN_ESPANOL_30S","descripcion":"DESCRIPCION_INSTAGRAM","imageUrl":"IMAGE_URL_AQUI"} 3) **YouTube Shorts**: {"platform":"youtube_shorts","guion":"GUION_COMUN_EN_ESPANOL_30S","descripcion":"TITULO_YOUTUBE_SHORTS_MUY_CORTO_MAX_100_CARACTERES","imageUrl":"IMAGE_URL_AQUI"} 4) **Bundle para Avatar (HeyGen/TTS)**: { "script": "Monologue script (solo texto, ~30s, nivel 6º primaria, curiosity gap al inicio, datos si existen, y que me sigan", "caption": "Caption SEO en español (máx. 5 hashtags)", "title": "Frase viral corta (≤ 8 palabras, sin emojis, sin puntuación salvo ? o !)" } # Reglas de Estilo y Contenido (recordatorio) - Nada de relleno (“en este video te voy a…”): ve **al grano**. - Hashtags **relevantes** y **limitados**. - Mantén **coherencia** con el contenido real de la página analizada. - Si la URL no carga o es ambigua, genera un guion verosímil según título y primeros textos; en descripciones sugiere “revisar enlace en bio/comentarios” (sin romper el JSON). # Checklist antes de devolver - [ ] Hook potente en 2–3s con curiosity gap. - [ ] Problema/Hecho → Contexto/Solución → Ejemplo/Impacto → CTA en ≤ 30s. - [ ] Nivel 6º primaria; datos concretos si existen. - [ ] Máx. 2 emojis en guion común; texto plano para TTS. - [ ] 3 objetos para plataformas + 1 bundle para avatar. - [ ] imageUrl válida (og:image o imagen principal); si no, "".

nodes.name: Create video avatar with background removal
Create video avatar with split screen (heygen free trial api)

parameters.content: # Approval by human for upload to social networks

nodes.name: Upload video to all social networks

parameters.content:
## Setup

### 1) Accounts & API keys
- **HeyGen** (Free/Trial or Paid API). Background removal requires the **paid** API plan.
- **https://dash.screenshotone.com/** (Free trial not credit card) for generate video background of the url
- **Upload-Post** (Free trial not credit card) for publishing.
- **OpenAI/Gemini** for scripting.
- *(Optional)* **ElevenLabs** (custom voice linked inside HeyGen).

### Add variables :
- In the Set Input Vars node

### 2) HeyGen configuration
- **Choose rendering mode**
  - **Free / Trial:** no background removal → split-screen layout (avatar bottom half, background video top half).
    - Set `background_removal: false`.
  - **Paid API:** background removal → clean cut-out avatar overlaid on the background video.
    - Set `background_removal: true` (requires paid plan).
- In the **Set Input Vars** node set:
  - `avatar_id` and `voice_id`
  - `background_video_url: https://...` (if using a background)

### 3) Upload-Post configuration
- In **SETUP UPLOAD-POST** node:
  - Generate api key and connect social networs: https://app.upload-post.com
  - Select the social networks you want to upload platform
  - The description for each social network is generated by AI agent
  - publish now or schedule_at

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
